price: (Ɛyε) ahummͻborͻ firi wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ. Nokorε sε Ɔne Otiefoͻ no a Ɔte biribiara no, na Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no.
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
